snippet: Data to be released will include employment figures for February and the trade deficit for January, and Staples and Kroger are among the companies scheduled to report earnings.
lead_paragraph: Data to be released will include employment figures for February and the trade deficit for January, and Staples and Kroger are among the companies scheduled to report earnings.

headline.seo: Economic Reports for the Week of March 4
headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead
